sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM m_product
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.p_id}} */ AND market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */

SELECT user_id
FROM t_user_log
WHERE login_token = :P1 /* {{$_GET.logintoken}} */ AND login_from = :P2 /* {{'Android'}} */

SELECT mp.id as p_id, mp.category_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_en as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_en as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, mp.prod_img2, mp.prod_img3, mp.prod_img4, mr.shop_name_en as shop_name, (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review FROM m_product mp left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id)
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id)  WHERE mp.status=1 AND mr.status = 1 AND mp.market_id=@market AND mp.id=@p_id AND mp.deleted_on is null AND mr.deleted_on is null ORDER by mp.id desc

coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review FROM m_product mp left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id)
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id)  WHERE mp.status=1 AND mr.status = 1 AND mp.market_id=@market AND mp.id=@p_id AND mp.deleted_on is null AND mr.deleted_on is null ORDER by mp.id desc
